In environment L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeArityF : nat -> nat codeArityFIsPR : isPR 1 codeArityF codeArityFIsCorrect1 : forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f)) codeArityFIsCorrect2 : forall n : nat, codeArityF n <> 0 -> exists f : Functions L, codeF f = n Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L f : Functions L ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) Unable to unify "1" with "cPairPi1 (wellFormedTermTerms (cPair (S (codeF f)) ((fix codeTerm (t : fol.Term L) : nat := match t with | @fol.var _ n => cPair 0 n | @fol.apply _ f ts => cPair (S (codeF f)) (codeTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts) end with codeTerms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) {struct ts} : nat := match ts with | @Tnil _ => 0 | @Tcons _ n0 t ss => S (cPair (codeTerm t) (codeTerms n0 ss)) end for codeTerms) (arity L (inr f)) ts)))".

original: intros t. unfold wellFormedTerm, codeTerm. destruct t as [n | f ts]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite (codeArityFIsCorrect1 f). reflexivity.
